categories: Category:Jedi Masters of the Jedi Order

nodes.text: Lamar the Fifth, also known as the Mad Master Lamar the Fifth, was a Humanoid male Jedi Master who passed away sometime before the Great Galactic War with the Sith Empire, but he endured as a tortured Force ghost until a Jedi named Ngani Zho helped his spirit find peace and become one with the Force.
